Réve Collection R70152 Lancia Stratos HF Turbo 1977 Giro d'Italia DNF S. Munari/P.Sodano

Purchased: 2014

How do you make a Group 5 Lancia Stratos even more outrageous? Strap a spare tire & wheel to the roof! While I seriously doubt it actually raced this way (I've found a few pictures of it without the tire) it certainly grabs your attention. A great model with the exception of the stripes on the rear louvers - it looks kind of like melting ice cream.
